articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: How the Mavericks went from the NBA's final four to national punchline - The Guardian
articles.description: One year after an improbable run to the West finals, the Mavericks have fallen apart in every way possible and become one of the NBA’s biggest jokes
articles.content: After committing one of the most egregious tank jobs in NBA history on Friday, the Mavericks have set the stage for Luka Doni to leave the franchise within the next two years. No sooner had Dallas wa… [+8379 chars]
